name: Cosmonyx Admin
tagline: Sign in, filter Cosmonyx companies, export PDF/Excel, and send reminder emails.
description: Admin skill for Cosmonyx: sign in with admin credentials, fetch all companies from the gateway API, then choose an actionâ€”filter by compliance status, risk type, or KYC status; export filtered (or all) records as PDF or Excel; optionally email the export to a recipient; or send reminder emails to companies (e.g. compliance not started or expiry before a date). Email is sent by this skill's own script (scripts/send-email.py) and TOOLS.md.
